casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ryan Lamar PARSONS 320P17-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2018 Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Ryan Lamar Parsons, Lorraine B. Lewis, Pro Se/Power of Attorney obo Parsons, for Parsons, Ryan Lamar.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of February 2018 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed Ex Mero Motu by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of April 2018."
